settings.title: How do I sign up for the Evenflo Rewards Program?
settings.content:
Create an account and then enter your first name, last name, email and a password. There is no cost to join and you will be given the option to sign up for emails. As a Rewards member, you'll be the first to know about promotions, product launches and more!

If you already have an account with us, then you are already a member of our Rewards Program! Just sign in and head over to our Rewards page to start earning points toward dollars off Evenflo baby gear - including our most recent product innovations.

settings.title: I already created an account on Evenflo.com. Do I need to create a new one to earn Rewards points?
settings.content: All customers with an active account are automatically enrolled in our Rewards Program.

settings.title: Where can I find my Rewards account info?
settings.content: All Rewards account info can be accessed on your Rewards page.

settings.title: Will I receive points for purchases made prior to creating my account?
settings.content:
Points will only be added for purchases made after the creation of your Rewards account. If you would like to earn points for your upcoming purchase, make sure to create an account before you checkout so that you are able to receive the points.

For questions related to your points or your account, please reach out to our Parentlink Consumer Care team at Parentlink@evenflo.com

settings.title: How do I redeem my points?
settings.content: To redeem your points during checkout, use the slider directly above your cart total to choose the amount you would like to apply. Click the "APPLY" button.

settings.title: Can I earn points on orders paid with a gift card?
settings.content: No. Points cannot be earned on orders paid with a gift card. If you use both a gift card and another form of payment, you will only earn points on the amount paid with the other form of payment.

settings.title: Is there a limit to how many points I can earn?
settings.content: No. There is no limit to the amount of points you can earn.

settings.title: When will I receive my birthday discount?
settings.content:
Happy Birthday! Weâ€™re so glad that you've chosen to celebrate with us through our Rewards Program. In order for you to receive a birthday bonus, you must register the date in your account at least 30 days prior to your birthday.

If your birthday falls between the day that you registered and the 30-day waiting period afterward, you will receive your birthday bonus 30 days after your registration. This delay is only applicable for the first year that you signed up.

All future birthday bonuses will be emailed to you on your birthday. If you register your birthday through your Rewards account any time after it has passed in the current calendar year, rewards will not be added to your account until the day of your birthday in the following year.

Remember, the birthday reward is determined by the Rewards member tier that you are part of on the date of your birthday. If it has been more than 30 days since you registered for your birthday reward and you still have not received the additional points in your account, please reach out to our Parentlink Consumer Care team at Parentlink@evenflo.com.

settings.title: If I return an item that I redeemed Rewards points on, will the points be refunded to my account?
settings.content: If you use your Rewards towards a purchase and later decide to return that item, your Rewards will be credited back to your Rewards account. For example, if you use a $10 coupon towards a $100 purchase that you decide to return, the $90 balance will be refunded to your method of payment and the $10 reward credit will be deposited back into your Rewards account.

settings.title: How can I earn points from a review?
settings.content: Points will only be received for reviews made for verified purchases. After making a purchase on Evenflo.com, you will receive an email requesting that you review the product you've purchased. Begin your review in that email and continue by following the link from the email. Once your review is complete, you will receive points for your review and even more points for adding a photo or video to your review! Only reviews made via the email link will accumulate points. Reviews written directly on the website are not able to be verified by our Rewards system and are not eligible for points.

settings.title: Can I combine my points with a valid coupon code on Evenflo.com?
settings.content: Yes. Loyalty points can be combined with valid coupon codes. Exclusions may apply. See promotion details for information on exclusions.

settings.title: How is my membership tier determined?
settings.content: Your membership tier is determined by how much you have spent on Evenflo.com over the time that you have had an account with us. If you have not made a purchase on Evenflo.com, you will be placed into the Bronze Tier, if you have spent $250 or more on Evenflo.com you will be in the Silver Tier, and if you have spent $800 or more on Evenflo.com, you will be placed into the Gold Tier of our Rewards Program.

settings.title: How will I know when I have reached a new tier?
settings.content: On the Rewards page, scroll down to "The VIP Club" progress bar. This will always detail your current tier status in the Rewards Program.

settings.title: Why didn't I earn points on my purchase?
settings.content: If you purchased with a gift card or were not logged into your account at the time of purchase, you will not have earned points. In the event these scenarios do not reflect your experience, please reach out to our Parentlink team at Parentlink@evenflo.com so they can take a look at your account.

settings.title: When will I see my points adjustment after shopping?
settings.content: Points earned with each purchase are updated when your order is processed. Points earned with other program benefits may reflect immediately in your account with the exception of referrals. If you have additional questions about your points total, please contact our Parentlink Consumer Care team at Parentlink@evenflo.com.
